name: Coin Collector (Ayntrx)
description:
~ Fixed coins not spawning when restarted.

FULL SCREEN HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

Control: 

W / Up Arrow = Move Up

A / Left Arrow  = Move Left

S / Down Arrow = Move Down

D / Move Right = Move Right

Gameplay: 

The goal of this game is to survive as long as you can before your money runs out.

The little bar on the bottom displays the time it takes before one money is taken away. Note: The bar moves faster the more money you have.

Things I Will Work On:

- Adding Cash currency based on your score when you run out of money.

- Better textures.

- Adding a skin shop. to use the cash in.

Note:

This is my first game, so please don't be too harsh in the comments :).

Any critique would help me a lot; balancing changes, UI changes, texture changes, ect.

My record is 55 by the way.
